comment.sortParamsByRequiredFlag: Sort method arguments to place required parameters before optional parameters. (Default: true)
comment.ensureUniqueParams: Whether to ensure parameter names are unique in an operation (rename parameters that are not). (Default: true)
comment.allowUnicodeIdentifiers: boolean, toggles whether unicode identifiers are allowed in names or not, default is false (Default: false)
comment.sourceFolder: source folder for generated code (Default: src)
comment.localVariablePrefix: prefix for generated code members and local variables
comment.projectName: name of the project (Default: generated from info.title or 'swagger-js-client')
comment.moduleName: module name for AMD, Node or globals (Default: generated from <projectName>)
comment.projectDescription: description of the project (Default: using info.description or 'Client library of <projectName>'
comment.projectVersion: version of the project (Default: using info.version or '1.0.0')
comment.projectLicenseName: name of the license the project uses (Default: using info.license.name)
comment.usePromises: use Promises as return values from the client API, instead of superagent callbacks (Default: false)
comment.emitModelMethods: generate getters and setters for model properties (Default: false)
comment.useInheritance: use JavaScript prototype chains & delegation for inheritance (Default: true)
comment.hideGenerationTimestamp: hides the timestamp when files were generated (Default: true)
